Verses: 1 andriyum, Manusharaal Therindhukollappatta Endhap Piradhaana Aasaariyanum Paavangalukkaaga Kaanikkaigalaiyum Baligalaiyum Seluththumpadi, Manusharukkaaga Dhevakaariyangalaippatri Niyamikkappadugiraan.
3 adhinimiththam Avan Janangaludaiya Paavangalukkaaga Baliyidavendiyadhupola, Thannudaiya Paavangalukkaagavum Baliyidavendiyadhaayirukkiradhu.
4 melum, Aaronaippola Dhevanaal Azhaikkappattaalozhiya, Oruvanum Indhak Ganamaana Oozhiyaththukkuth Thaanaai Erpadugiradhillai.
5 andhappadiye Kiristhuvum Piradhaana Aasaariyaraagiradharkuth Thammaiththaame Uyarththavillai; Neer Ennudaiya Kumaaran, Indru Naan Ummai Jenippiththen Endru Avarode Sonnavare Avarai Uyarththinaar.
6 appadiye Veroru Idaththilum: Neer Melkisedhekkin Muraimaiyinpadi, Endrendraikkum Aasaariyaraayirukkireer Endru Solliyirukkiraar.

7 avar Maamsaththilirundha Naatkalil, Thammai Maranaththinindru Ratchikka Vallamaiyullavarai Nokki, Balaththa Saththaththodum Kanneerodum Vinnappampanni, Vendudhalseydhu, Thamakku Undaana Bayabakthiyinimiththam Ketkappattu,
9 thaam Pooranaraanapinbu, Thamakkuk Keezhppadigira Yaavarum Niththiya Ratchippai Adaivadharkuk Kaaranaraagi,
10 melkisedhekkin Muraimaiyinpadiyaana Piradhaana Aasaariyar Endru Dhevanaale Naamam Tharikkappattaar.
11 indha Melkisedhekkaippatri Naam Visthaaramaaip Pesalaam; Neengal Kelviyil Mandhamullavargalaanapadiyaal, Adhai Vilangappannugiradhu Aridhaayirukkum.

12 kaalaththaip Paarththaal, Podhagaraayirukkavendiya Ungalukku Dhevanudaiya Vaakkiyangalin Moola Ubadhesangalai Marupadiyum Ubadhesikkavendiyadhaayirukkiradhu; Neengal Balamaana Aagaaraththaiyalla, Paalai Unnaththakkavargalaaneergal.
14 balamaana Aagaaramaanadhu Nanmai Theemaiyinnadhendru Payirchiyinaal Paguththariyaththakkadhaaga Muyarchiseyyum Gnaanendhiriyangalaiyudaiyavargalaagiya Poorana Vayadhullavargalukke Thagum.
